subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is not to be confused with {{l|mul|𠘧}} (U+20627) which is another radical in ''{{w|Shuowen Jiezi|Shuōwén}}''.

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* [[Index:Chinese radical/几]]
* {{l|mul|[[仉]], [[㞦]], [[㲹]], [[机]], [[肌]], [[矶]], [[籶]], [[虮]], [[䘛]], [[𮗸]], [[釠]], [[飢]]([[饥]]), [[䡄]], [[𮬥]], [[䢳]], [[冗]], [[亢]], [[𭅠]], [[𭙍]], [[芁]], [[秃]],<!-- Note: 鳧/鳬(凫) is derived from 𠘧 not 几 (Refer Shuōwén) --> [[麂]], [[𭍚]]}} <!-- Note: Characters not found under radical index of 几 -->
* {{l|mul|[[讥]], [[机]]<!-- Note: 机 also exists as unsimplified character -->}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} from {{l|mul|[[譏]], [[機]]}} in {{w|traditional Chinese}})''
